pages.text: $(o)The knowledge about Nicromancy was the main act by which the Villagers exiled the Illagers of their villages.$(br2)$(o)A very dangerous creature made up of multiple souls can be awakened.$(br2)$(o)This ritual requires to place three $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wither_skeleton_skull)Wither Skeleton Skulls$(/l) and four blocks of $(l)Soul Sand$() or $(l)Soul Soil$() in an specific order.
